content.query:
create or Alter view rtg_ecevents
as
select *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'gold/rtg_ecevents',
        data_source = 'malta',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [rtg_ecevents];

create or Alter view rtg_moves
as
select *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'gold/rtg_moves',
        data_source = 'malta',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [rtg_moves];

create or Alter view rtg_productivity
as
select *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'gold/rtg_productivity',
        data_source = 'malta',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [rtg_productivity];
